name: folder2podcast
description: Convert audio folders to podcast feeds with HTTP server

scripts.dev: cross-env PORT=3000 BASE_URL=http://192.168.55.136:3000 AUDIO_DIR="$HOME/Desktop/audio_books" ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.docker: docker run -d --pull always --name folder2podcast -p 3000:3000 -v $HOME/Desktop/audio_books:/podcasts -e PORT=3000 -e BASE_URL=http://192.168.55.136:3000 yaotutu/folder2podcast:main
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop folder2podcast-test && docker rm folder2podcast-test
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:stop && docker rmi folder2podcast:dev
